urls = c('http://data.insideairbnb.com/the-netherlands/north-holland/amsterdam/2023-09-03/visualisations/listings.csv', 'http://data.insideairbnb.com/germany/be/berlin/2023-06-22/visualisations/listings.csv', 'http://data.insideairbnb.com/belgium/bru/brussels/2023-06-24/visualisations/listings.csv', 'http://data.insideairbnb.com/united-kingdom/england/london/2023-06-08/visualisations/listings.csv', 'http://data.insideairbnb.com/france/ile-de-france/paris/2023-06-06/visualisations/listings.csv')

bind_rows(datasets)

# Functie om reviews te berekenen voor een specifieke stad
calculate_reviews_for_city <- function(dataset, city_name, top_n = 100, bottom_n = 100) {
  # Filter data voor de opgegeven stad
  city_data <- subset(dataset, room_type == "Private room")
  
  # Sorteer de dataset op prijs in oplopende volgorde
  sorted_listings <- city_data[order(city_data$price), ]
  
  # Selecteer de top 100 en bottom 100 listings
  bottom_100 <- sorted_listings[1:bottom_n, ]
  top_100 <- sorted_listings[(nrow(sorted_listings) - (top_n - 1)):nrow(sorted_listings), ]
  
  # Bereken het totale aantal reviews voor elk subset
  total_reviews_top <- sum(top_100$number_of_reviews)
  total_reviews_bottom <- sum(bottom_100$number_of_reviews)
  
  # Vergelijk het totale aantal reviews en geef resultaat weer met getallen
  if (total_reviews_top > total_reviews_bottom) {
    cat(paste("Top", top_n, "single room listings in", city_name, "have more reviews (", total_reviews_top, ") than bottom", bottom_n, "single room listings (", total_reviews_bottom, ").\n"))
  } else if (total_reviews_top < total_reviews_bottom) {
    cat(paste("Bottom", bottom_n, "single room listings in", city_name, "have more reviews (", total_reviews_bottom, ") than top", top_n, "single room listings (", total_reviews_top, ").\n"))
  } else {
    cat(paste("Top", top_n, "and bottom", bottom_n, "single room listings in", city_name, "have the same number of reviews (", total_reviews_top, ").\n"))
  }
}

# Voorbeeldgebruik:

# Amsterdam (dataset 1)
calculate_reviews_for_city(datasets[[1]], city_name = "Amsterdam")

# Berlijn (dataset 2)
calculate_reviews_for_city(datasets[[2]], city_name = "Berlijn")

# Brussel (dataset 3)
calculate_reviews_for_city(datasets[[3]], city_name = "Brussel")

# Londen (dataset 4)
calculate_reviews_for_city(datasets[[4]], city_name = "Londen")

# Parijs (dataset 5)
calculate_reviews_for_city(datasets[[5]], city_name = "Parijs")
